# tiler

[![AppVeyor Build Status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/leonawicz/tiler?branch=master&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/leonawicz/tiler)

## Installation

Install the development version from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("leonawicz/tiler")
```
